articles.author: Edward Walsh
articles.title: Jesse Jackson, a leading African American voice on global stage, dies at 84 - The Washington Post
articles.description: A former aide to Martin Luther King Jr., he launched two historic presidential campaigns while spreading a message of hope and resilience: “I am — somebody.”
articles.content: The Rev. Jesse Jackson, a charismatic preacher who became the leading voice of Black American aspirations in the years after the assassination of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. and was the first Afr… [+368 chars]
